title: team builder viability
body:
blind is all about who can type/insta lock their preferred role first.
team builder takes 3 weeks to build a team.
draft pick was the closest thing to a non insta lock game outside of ranked, and didnt take as long as team builder to complete.

i like builder but presumably getting rid of draft to boost builder numbers didn't work.
builder isn't working as a play list, is there some kind of attachment to it to keep it around?
i say get rid of blind pick as well as draft or scrap builder

replies.body:
I love team builder because you are able to get the role/champ you want to play. Kind of sad that people don't view it this way and would prefer to do blind and go in ready to instalock leaving team builder ques taking 5ever. I feel that I viable option to satisfy many is to cycle team builder and blind draft every couple of weeks/months.

And like *Your Neighbour* said, having those in team builder teams able to be matched with some people from draft ques would make the match making a whole lot quicker :D

Pretty happy with team builder, never played roles I want this much often.

But it would be nice if the team builder teams can be matched with 5 randoms picked from draft queues... that would be fun!
